description: This file defines API route handlers for user management using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting users, and depends on a UsersService for data operations.

methods.name: get_users_service
methods.description: Provides a UsersService instance, connected to the database, for dependency injection in route handlers.

methods.name: list_users
methods.description: Handles GET /users; returns a paginated list of users.

methods.name: get_user
methods.description: Handles GET /users/{user_id}; fetches a single user by ID.

methods.name: create_user
methods.description: Handles POST /users; creates a new user.

methods.name: update_user
methods.description: Handles PUT /users/{user_id}; updates an existing user.
